name: Bound in Vengeance
description:
They have taken everything that you hold dear, your title and honor is gone. Sent to a damp crypt, you wait for the end of your days when an ancient ghost offers you its power in search for vengence.

You are bound in both soul and purpose, all who have scorned you will hang by the chains you have been shackled with.

Developers: Arkzenir & Kristas

Tileset by: 0x72

Made for #GMTK2021
